original_text: He said to the girl, ‘Ask me for anything that you want. I make a strong promise that I will give it to you.’
korean_text: 헤롯이 맹세로 그에게 무엇이든지 달라는 대로 주겠다고 약속하거늘

sentences.original_text: 'Ask me for anything that you want
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 원하는 것은 무엇이든지 나에게 구하라

sentences.original_text: that I will give it to you.'
